financial_data_providers.name: Alpha Vantage
financial_data_providers.description: Provides realtime and historical financial market data through powerful developer-friendly APIs and spreadsheets. Covers traditional asset classes, economic indicators, forex rates, commodities, fundamental data, and technical indicators.

financial_data_providers.name: Benzinga
financial_data_providers.description: Financial data provider with APIs focused on information that moves the market. Specializes in market-moving news and data.

financial_data_providers.name: BizToc
financial_data_providers.description: Financial news aggregator using Rapid API for REST API access. Provides news stream integrated with OpenBB Terminal.

financial_data_providers.name: Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS)
financial_data_providers.description: U.S. government agency providing public access to economic data from all BLS programs through its Public Data API.

financial_data_providers.name: Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE)
financial_data_providers.description: World's leading derivatives and exchange network providing trading, clearing, and investment solutions. Delivers cutting-edge market data.

financial_data_providers.name: Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC)
financial_data_providers.description: U.S. government agency promoting the integrity, resilience, and vibrancy of derivatives markets through public reporting API.

financial_data_providers.name: Congress.gov
financial_data_providers.description: Official U.S. Congress API providing legislative data including bills, summaries, and related information. Also provides access to presidential documents and regulations.

financial_data_providers.name: Deribit
financial_data_providers.description: Cryptocurrency derivatives exchange providing official public data through unofficial Python client implementation.

financial_data_providers.name: European Central Bank (ECB)
financial_data_providers.description: Provides access to all official ECB statistics through the ECB Data Portal with options to download data and comprehensive metadata.

financial_data_providers.name: EconDB
financial_data_providers.description: Economic data provider processing information at different granularity levels using official statistics agencies and alternative data sources for market observations.

financial_data_providers.name: Fama-French Research Portfolios and Factors
financial_data_providers.description: Implements Fama-French research portfolios and factors data library maintained by Kenneth R. French at Dartmouth College. Essential for academic and professional financial research.

financial_data_providers.name: Federal Reserve (FED)
financial_data_providers.description: Central Bank of the United States providing access to comprehensive economic and financial data through its official data portal.

financial_data_providers.name: Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA)
financial_data_providers.description: Self-regulatory organization providing centralized access to abundant market data for public, media, researchers, and member firms.

financial_data_providers.name: FinViz
financial_data_providers.description: Stock market analysis platform with unofficial API implementation providing stock screening and analysis data.

financial_data_providers.name: Financial Modeling Prep (FMP)
financial_data_providers.description: Comprehensive financial data provider offering stock market information including news, currencies, and stock prices.

financial_data_providers.name: Federal Reserve Economic Data (FRED)
financial_data_providers.description: Database maintained by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis containing over 816,000 economic time series from various sources.

financial_data_providers.name: U.S. Government Data (Data.gov)
financial_data_providers.description: Official U.S. government open data website providing access to datasets published by federal agencies to drive innovation and transparency.

financial_data_providers.name: International Monetary Fund (IMF)
financial_data_providers.description: Provides access to International Monetary Fund data through JSON RESTful web services.

financial_data_providers.name: Intrinio
financial_data_providers.description: Financial data platform providing real-time and historical financial market data to businesses and developers through comprehensive API.

financial_data_providers.name: Multpl
financial_data_providers.description: Provides public broad-market data and financial metrics published through Multpl.com.

financial_data_providers.name: NASDAQ
financial_data_providers.description: Technology and capital markets provider offering premier platforms and services positioned at the nexus of global capital markets.

financial_data_providers.name: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
financial_data_providers.description: International organization providing data and metadata for OECD countries and selected non-member economies through Data Explorer.

financial_data_providers.name: Polygon.io
financial_data_providers.description: Comprehensive stocks API providing REST endpoints for querying latest market data from all US stock exchanges with additional corporate data.

financial_data_providers.name: Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)
financial_data_providers.description: U.S. regulatory body for public listings providing access to company filings and regulatory documents.

financial_data_providers.name: Seeking Alpha
financial_data_providers.description: Data provider offering news, analysis, and real-time alerts on stocks with investment research content.

financial_data_providers.name: Stockgrid
financial_data_providers.description: Smart money tracking platform providing in-depth data on large option blocks and sentiment analysis.

financial_data_providers.name: Tiingo
financial_data_providers.description: Reliable, enterprise-grade financial markets API powering hedge funds, tech companies, and individual investors.

financial_data_providers.name: TMX Group
financial_data_providers.description: Canadian financial markets operator providing data for Toronto Stock Exchange, TSX Venture Exchange, and other Canadian market venues.

financial_data_providers.name: Tradier
financial_data_providers.description: Full-range brokerage services provider offering scalable, secure REST-based APIs for trading, account management, and market data.

financial_data_providers.name: Trading Economics
financial_data_providers.description: Comprehensive economic data provider offering historical data and forecasts for 196 countries with 20+ million economic indicators.

financial_data_providers.name: U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA)
financial_data_providers.description: U.S. government energy agency committed to free and open data through APIs and open data tools.

financial_data_providers.name: Wall Street Journal (WSJ)
financial_data_providers.description: Business-focused international daily newspaper providing financial news, analysis, and market information.

financial_data_providers.name: Yahoo Finance
financial_data_providers.description: Web-based platform offering financial news, data, and tools for investors interested in tracking and analyzing financial markets.
